Read chunks of output data files generated above into one data frame
```{r}
read_onefile <- function(path){
  load(path)
  return(df)
}
data_path <- "./data/v2/"
files <-  list.files(data_path, pattern = "df_plantwhc_mct")
df_mct <- purrr::map_dfr( files, ~read_onefile(paste0(data_path, .))) %>% 
  unnest(out_ilon_ilat)
save(df_mct, file = "data/df_mct_v2.Rdata")
```

Extract return level (mm) for a given return period (yr) and convert data frame to an array (grid).
```{r}
## Load v1 (grid) file (NetCDF)
nc_20y <- read_nc_onefile("data/whc_mct_20y_v1.nc")
nc_40y <- read_nc_onefile("data/whc_mct_40y_v1.nc")
df_mct_v1 <- tibble( return_level_20y = c(nc_20y$vars$whc_mct_20y),
                     return_level_40y = c(nc_40y$vars$whc_mct_40y)) %>% 
  tidyr::drop_na()

## v2 data
load("data/df_mct_v2.Rdata")
df_mct_v2 <- df_mct
rm("df_mct")

df_mct_v2 <- df_mct_v2 %>% 
  mutate(return_level_20y = purrr::map(data, ~slice(., 4))) %>%   # 20-year return period is the 4th row
  mutate(return_level_20y = purrr::map_dbl(return_level_20y, 2)) %>% 
  mutate(return_level_40y = purrr::map(data, ~slice(., 6))) %>%   # 40-year return period is the 6th row
  mutate(return_level_40y = purrr::map_dbl(return_level_40y, 2))
```

```{r}
# df_mct_v1 %>% 
#   ggplot(aes(x = return_level_20y)) +
#   geom_histogram() +
#   xlim(0,10)

df_tmp <- df_mct_v2 %>%
  dplyr::select(return_level_20y) %>%
  mutate(version = "v2") %>%
  bind_rows(
    dplyr::select(df_mct_v1, return_level_20y) %>%
      mutate(version = "v1")
  )

# only v1 data
df_tmp %>% 
  filter(version == "v1") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(
    aes(x = return_level_20y, fill = version), 
    color = "black", alpha = 0.3, binwidth = 2, 
    position="identity") +
  xlim(0,200) +
  scale_fill_manual(name = "", values = c("black", "red"))   #, labels = c("v1", "v2")

# only v2 data
df_tmp %>% 
  filter(version == "v2") %>% 
  ggplot() +
  geom_histogram(
    aes(x = return_level_20y, fill = version), 
    color = "black", alpha = 0.3, binwidth = 0.1, 
    position="identity") +
  xlim(0,10) +
  scale_fill_manual(name = "", values = c("black", "red"))   #, labels = c("v1", "v2")
```


```{r}
## convert to a 2D matrix (grid)
grid_mct_20y_v2 <- df_mct_v2 %>% 
  df_to_grid(varnam = "return_level_20y", grid = "halfdeg") 
grid_mct_40y_v2 <- df_mct_v2 %>% 
  df_to_grid(varnam = "return_level_40y", grid = "halfdeg")

## save as NetCDF
dirnam <- "/alphadata01/bstocker/sofun/output_nc_global_sofun/"
write_nc2(
  var = grid_mct_20y_v2, 
  varnam = "whc_mct_20y", 
  filnam_template = paste0(dirnam, "s1_fapar3g_v3_global.fland.nc"), 
  outfilnam = "data/whc_mct_20y_v2.nc",
  lonnam_template = "lon", 
  latnam_template = "lat"
  )
write_nc2(
  var = grid_mct_40y_v2, 
  varnam = "whc_mct_40y", 
  filnam_template = paste0(dirnam, "s1_fapar3g_v3_global.fland.nc"), 
  outfilnam = "data/whc_mct_40y_v2.nc",
  lonnam_template = "lon", 
  latnam_template = "lat"
  )

## create plots
plot_map(grid_mct_20y_v2, lev = c(0,200, 10), color = c( "wheat", "tomato2", "tomato4", "darkorchid4" ), minval = 0, maxval = 2000, file="fig/map_mct_20y_v2.pdf")

plot_map(grid_mct_40y_v2, lev = c(0,200, 10), color = c( "wheat", "tomato2", "tomato4", "darkorchid4" ), minval = 0, maxval = 2000, file="fig/map_mct_40y_v2.pdf")
```
